SyncTreeEntry org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.NodeBuilder.NodeCommon< X >.createNodeCommon ( Collection< X >  objects,
int  depth,
SyncHashCache  shc,
SyncNodeCache  cache 
)

Creates a new SyncNodeComposite referenced by the returned SyncTreeEntry from the input objects (which will be either nodes or leafs).

The new node starts with the first node entered and ends when there are no more objecs or there is no more room based on various criteria depending on whether its a node of leaves or of nodes. Objects which have been included in the new node are removed from the input object.

Parameters:
objects collection of objects for building the node
depth depth of new node
shc the associated hash cache
cache the associated node cache
Returns:
new SyncTreeEntry referencing the new node
abstract int org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.NodeBuilder.NodeCommon< X >.extraSplit ( X  co,
X  po,
int  total,
int  minLen,
int  prev 
) [pure virtual]

Allows use of special case rules to end the node creation early - i.e.

before we just run out of the maximum space.

Parameters:
co current object
po previous object
total current total
minLen minimum length before we can split
prev input from prev call
Returns:
-1 if we should end, input for next call otherwise
